question: Please give the meaning of the duaa LA ILLAHA ILLAH INI KUNTUM MINIS ZALIMIEN and when should one read this duaa.Also give a duaa,to come out of debts. I just cannot progress.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Translit: Laa ilaaha illaa anta subhaanaka inniy kuntu minaz zaalimeen
Trans: There is none worthy of worship but You (Allah). You are pure. Verily
I am among the oppressors.

The above is the Du'aa made by Yunus (Alayhis salaam) while in the belly of
a fish in the depth of the sea. The Du'aa is very efficient for any
difficulties.

We also advise you recite, 'Yaa Wahhaabu' abundantly.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
